code: public void testRandom() {     try (BitArray bitArray = new BitArray(1, BigArrays.NON_RECYCLING_INSTANCE)) {         int numBits = randomIntBetween(1000, 10000).         for (int step = 0. step < 3. step++) {             boolean[] bits = new boolean[numBits].             List<Integer> slots = new ArrayList<>().             for (int i = 0. i < numBits. i++) {                 bits[i] = randomBoolean().                 slots.add(i).             }             Collections.shuffle(slots, random()).             for (int i : slots) {                 if (bits[i]) {                     bitArray.set(i).                 } else {                     bitArray.clear(i).                 }             }             for (int i = 0. i < numBits. i++) {                 assertEquals(bitArray.get(i), bits[i]).             }         }     } }
